Connect open source maintainers with companies

Every project has needs beyond code. Companies need sustainable dependencies. We bridge the gap with expert services for both maintainers and organizations.

For Maintainers

Get help scaling your project, building community, and creating sustainable funding.

Explore Maintainer Services

For Companies

Secure your supply chain, train employees, and support critical dependencies.

Explore Company Services

How it works

1

Create your wishlist

Select the services your project needs from our catalog

2

Share your list

Add the wishlist link to your README or project docs

3

Get support

Community members and sponsors fund the services you need
